definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face

sentences.english: Ceiling fans help to circulate the air, keeping the air temperature 3-8 degrees cooler.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇能流通空氣，使空氣溫度降低三到八度。

sentences.english: The ceiling fan depends from the ceiling.
This machine is specially designed for slot cell or wedge paper insertion of ceiling fan stators .
sentences.chinese: 本機適合吊扇馬達定子之絕緣紙或絕緣片插入。

sentences.english: Incorporate whole-house ventilation and ceiling fans.
Learn how to assemble the cover for your ceiling fan in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何爲您的吊扇組裝在此免費視頻剪輯的封面。

sentences.english: In summer, there are fans on the ceiling and a breeze from the windows.
sentences.chinese: 夏季時，車廂頂部有吊扇，窗外會吹來微風。

sentences.english: Inside, two young Taliban in clean long white tunics and small white prayer caps recited the Qur'an while a fan in the ceiling stirred the hot air.
sentences.chinese: 天花板上，一個吊扇在攪動着燥熱的空氣。

sentences.english: In recent years, luxury ceiling fan sweeping Europe and America, deeply consumer's affection.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，豪華吊扇風靡歐美地區，深受消費者的喜愛。

sentences.english: Do not suspend the lamp above the bed or ceiling fan.
sentences.chinese: 睡牀上方不要懸吊燈具或吊扇。

sentences.english: He kept BONKING his head on the ceiling fan.
sentences.chinese: 他總把頭碰得吊扇砰砰想。？

sentences.english: Learn how to prepare the wiring needed to install your ceiling fan in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何準備需要安裝在此免費視頻剪輯的吊扇接線。

sentences.english: If you have a ceiling fan, change the direction of the blades.
sentences.chinese: 如果你家有吊扇的話，把葉片的方向轉一下。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
